TopicTitle: My own Demonyms for celestial bodies.

Articles.Content:
Celestial Body-Demonym, alternate demonym, plural demonym for kerbals living there/language.

Sun/Kerbol-Kerbolar, Kerbolites

Moho-Mohian, Mohoan, Mohites

Eve-Evian, Evear, Evians

Gilly-Gillian, [people in Gilly-Gan's Asterisland are called Gillygans], Gillians

Kerbin-Kerban, Kerbil, Prime Kerbals

Mun-Munar, Munesqe, Kelenites/Munars

Minmus-Minman, Minmonian, Minmars

Duna-Dunar, Dune, Dunese

Ike-Ikian, Ikar, Ikites

Dres-Dreslian, Dreslar, Dreslians

Jool-Joolian, Joovar, Joolians

Laythe-Laythar, Laythian, Laythers

Vall-Vallian, Vallar, Vallians

Tylo-Tylan, Tylonian, Tyloniars

Bop-Bopin, Bopen, Boppers

Pol-Pollen, Pollar, Pollens

Eeloo-Eeloon, Eelooian, Eelites

My Fan Planets:

(Pluto analog named becasue of the fictional element Blutonium) Bluto-Blutonian, Bluton, Blutons

(Saturn analog, and Eeloo is a Kertan Moon, named after Kurtjmac) Kertan-Kertan, Kertanian, Kertese

(Uranus analog [pronouce it as Ooh-Rahn-Us] Named after Scott Manley) Scortma-Scortman, Scotan, Scotmanlies

Edited June 24, 2013 by GregroxMun
Is there any reason you posted this while a thread about just this was still on the front page? No disrespect intended here but this seems like something the mods would have jumped on rather quickly.

There seems to be a common theme in these particular forums that when someone actually posts an original idea, someone else has to post a very similar idea and call it their own. Then again, this particular post MIGHT have been an accidental "New Post" instead of a "Reply to Thread".... *shrugs*

There seems to be a common theme in these particular forums that when someone actually posts an original idea, someone else has to post a very similar idea and call it their own.

Yes. I see something, I, in an attentionhoggish manner, make my own thread.
